DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study Immune Ablation CD34+ Peripheral Blood Stem Cell Support Patients With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour 2 dos . Patients receive filgrastim ( G-CSF ) subcutaneously ( SC ) begin 24 hour completion cyclophosphamide continue leukapheresis complete . Leukapheresis continue daily target number cell harvest . CD 34+ cell isolated peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) vitro . Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour day -5 -2 , anti-thymocyte globulin IV 10 hour day -4 -2 , G-CSF SC begin day 0 continue blood count recover . Patients undergo reinfusion CD34+ PBSC day 0 . Patients follow weekly 90 day , monthly 1 year , 2 year .
